alert.note: Alert for Clay; Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:14AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clay and southern Hamilton Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1214 AM CDT, an automated weather station reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Trumbull to Inland to near Glenvil. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sutton, Harvard, Clay Center, Edgar, Fairfield, Giltner, Glenvil, Trumbull, Inland, Deweese, Ong, Saronville and Stockham. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 318 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
